title: Fragments, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: 2/1 twill patterned with plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 42.8 x 23 cm (16 7/8 x 9 1/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 29 x 19.5 cm (11 7/16 x 7 11/16 in.)
description: Patterned with bands depicting an eagle and broken branch, a swimming swan, sun and foliage, and cascading leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 14th century.
14th century. Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: 2/1 twill patterned with plain weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-329-a,b.
